<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H0102|אַגָּף]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּף‎</span>] **noun feminine**: [[Dan.7.4|Dan 7:4]] ==wing of bird== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּפְּא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּנְפָּא‎</span> (? [[BDB#Dalm|D]]<sup>WB 79</sup>), Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; akin to Biblical Hebrew  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֲגַף‎</span>, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***aggapu ?***</u></abbr> according to [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 77</sup> (compare Mandean <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גאדפא‎</span>, [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּדְפָּא‎</span>), Id<sup>GGA, 1884, 1019,</sup> √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גִדף‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***fly, row*** (but this loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>227</sup>)); — plural absolute ***wings***, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּפִּין‎</span> [[Dan.7.4|Dan 7:4]]; [[Dan.7.6|Dan 7:6]] suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎גַּפִּיהּ‎</span> v[[Dan.7.4|Dan 7:4]] [[BDB#Kt|Kt]] ([[BDB#Qr|Qr]] singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נַּפַּהּ‎</span>).
